verbs.description: [ARG0: red sox] get to kershaw early and [V: put] [ARG1: the game] [ARG2: away] [ARGM-TMP: late] [ARGM-TMP: as dodgers fall 8 - 4 in game 1 of the world series] visual recap of the worlds series games between the los angeles dodgers and boston red sox dodgers eduardo nunez alex cora boston boston red sox j d martinez clayton kershaw dave roberts outfielder world red sox sox dave roberts los angeles dodgers los angeles times steve pearce eduardo núñez justin turner matt kemp manny machado kershaw alex wood world series
